page.title: 05PEDESTRIANISATION (cont)
page.content: { TRAFFIC PROBLEMS There are problems all over Dumfries concerning traffic and pedestrians.On the High Street there are many moving vehicles which lead to noise and are particularly dangerous on Saturdays. The pavement on the West side of the High Street is often over crowded.On the High Street just below the Midsteeple,parked cars on the cobbles are visually intrusive.There is also a problem with Friars Vennel because pavements are too narrow.Disabled pedestrians have a nightmare of a time crossing roads in Dumfries as road crossings are poor,especialy at the English Street/Shakespeare Street junction.
